titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Good Ground Methodist Episcopal Church records 1977.427
titlestmt.author: Nicholas Pavlik
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection was processed and described as part of the project, "Uncovering the Secrets of Brooklyn's 19th Century Past: Creation to Consolidation," funded by the Council on Library and Information Resources, with additional support from The Gladys Krieble Delmas Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2023-08-21 11:09:06 +0000.

did.unittitle: Good Ground Methodist Episcopal Church records

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: Good Ground Methodist Episcopal Church (Brooklyn, New York, N.Y.)

did.abstract: This collection consists of subscription lists, receipts, and accounts for the building fund of the Good Ground Methodist Episcopal Church in Brooklyn, N.Y. Items date from 1865 to 1867.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Minimally processed to the collection level.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); Good Ground Methodist Episcopal Church records, 1977.427, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Historical Society.
